name: S-Snake

trigger.text: Up to 1 of your opponent's Characters with a cost of 6 or less other than [Monkey.D.Luffy] cannot attack during this turn.

text: [On Play] If your Leader has the {Egghead} type and you have 2 or more Life cards, you may add up to 1 Character card with a [Trigger] from your hand to the top of your Life cards face-up.

effect.text: If your Leader has the {Egghead} type and you have 2 or more Life cards, you may add up to 1 Character card with a [Trigger] from your hand to the top of your Life cards face-up.
